decks.notes: The main theme of this deck is to utilize ramp and control elements to quickly bring out powerful Eldrazi creatures like Emrakul, the Promised End and World Breaker. The deck focuses on generating resource advantage through cards like Kozilek's Command and Kozilek's Return, while also disrupting the opponent?s strategy with cards like Malevolent Rumble and Ghost Quarter. By accelerating the mana generation with cards like Eldrazi Temple and Utopia Sprawl, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with big threats early in the game and maintain control throughout the match.

This deck focuses on using artifacts to quickly overwhelm the opponent with a flurry of cheap, efficient threats. By employing cards like Mox Opal and Springleaf Drum to accelerate mana production, as well as Pinnacle Emissary to generate extra artifacts, the deck can quickly deploy its threats and power up Cranial Plating to deal lethal damage. Additionally, cards like Metallic Rebuke provide disruption and protection, while cards like Thoughtcast provide card advantage to keep the engine running smoothly. The deck aims to win quickly through a combination of aggression and resilience.

This deck focuses on utilizing powerful multicolored creatures and spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive plays. By combining a variety of colors and utilizing cards like Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury and Scion of Draco, the deck aims to put pressure on the opponent early and close out the game before they have a chance to stabilize. With a mix of creatures, spells, and land cards, this deck aims to maintain a solid balance between aggression and resilience in order to outpace and outmaneuver the opponent in a Modern 1 vs 1 matchup.

This deck focuses on quickly deploying an army of artifact creatures and boosting them with equipment like Cranial Plating to deal damage to the opponent as quickly as possible. It also includes cards like Metallic Rebuke for disruption and Thoughtcast for card draw. The synergy between artifacts and cards like Urza's Saga and Mox Opal allows for explosive turns and the ability to overwhelm the opponent with a strong board presence. The goal is to win the game by attacking aggressively and efficiently utilizing the resources provided by the artifacts in the deck.

This deck focuses on quickly deploying a board presence using artifact creatures and mana rocks, while disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards like Pithing Needle and Metallic Rebuke. Emry, Lurker of the Loch and Mishra's Bauble help with card advantage and setting up powerful plays. Urza's Saga is a key card in generating value and tutoring for artifacts. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and efficient spells, while maintaining control of the board through disruption and card advantage.

The main focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells, using cards like Guide of Souls and Galvanic Discharge to quickly deal damage. The combination of Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury and Ocelot Pride can create a powerful board presence, while Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Goblin Bombardment provide additional ways to push through damage. The inclusion of cards like Arena of Glory and Voice of Victory allows for additional support for the aggressive strategy. Overall, this Boros Aggro deck aims to win the game quickly by overwhelming the opponent with a combination of creatures and burn spells.

This deck focuses on assembling a powerful combo using cards that do not require the use of lands. It includes a variety of cards to manipulate the opponent's game plan and disrupt their strategy. By combining specific cards together, the player can unleash a devastating combo that can quickly overpower their opponent. The deck includes cards for card draw, disruption, and protection, in order to ensure the combo can be successfully executed. With careful planning and execution, this deck can quickly take control of the game and secure a victory.

The deck focuses on assembling the UrzaTron lands to generate a large amount of mana quickly. It aims to control the game by playing powerful threats such as Ugin, the Spirit Dragon and Karn, the Great Creator, while disrupting opponents with cards like Thought-Knot Seer and Dismember. The deck also includes Eldrazi creatures like Devourer of Destiny and Sire of Seven Deaths to pressure opponents and close out the game. Additional tools like All Is Dust and Relic of Progenitus help to deal with specific threats and disrupt opponent strategies.

This Ruby Storm deck aims to quickly generate a large amount of mana through spells like Pyretic Ritual and Desperate Ritual, while also getting card advantage with cards like Manamorphose and Reckless Impulse. The deck then transitions into a big finish with cards like Past in Flames to recast spells, Ral, Monsoon Mage to deal damage, and Grapeshot to finish off the opponent. The deck also includes Wish cards to search for specific answers or win conditions when needed. It is a fast-paced combo deck that aims to overwhelm the opponent in a single explosive turn.

This deck focuses on playing aggressively with a combination of powerful creatures like Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury, Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer, Scion of Draco, and Territorial Kavu. The goal is to control the board with Leyline of the Guildpact and Leyline Binding while using spells like Lightning Bolt and Stubborn Denial to disrupt the opponent's game plan. Consign to Memory provides additional flexibility and card advantage. The mana base is designed to support the aggressive strategy with a mix of fetch lands and dual lands.

The deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with key creatures like Griselbrand and Atraxa, Grand Unifier, and then bringing them back into play through cards like Goryo's Vengeance. It also includes disruption spells like Force of Negation and Thoughtseize to protect the combo and control the game. The combination of instant-speed reanimation and disruptive elements allows the deck to surprise opponents and quickly overpower them with powerful creatures. The deck aims to be fast and efficient, using a mix of combo pieces and control spells to achieve victory.

The main concept of this UrzaTron Control deck is to assemble the Urza's Tower, Urza's Mine, and Urza's Power Plant to generate a large amount of mana quickly. This allows the deck to play powerful threats like Karn, the Great Creator, Ugin, the Eye of the Storms, and Thought-Knot Seer earlier than usual. The deck also utilizes cards like Chalice of the Void and All Is Dust to disrupt the opponent's game plan while maintaining card advantage. Overall, the deck is focused on controlling the game and overwhelming the opponent with efficient threats and disruption.

This deck focuses on quickly equipping a creature, often an Ornithopter, with Colossus Hammer to create a lethal threat. The deck includes multiple ways to tutor for the necessary pieces, such as Stoneforge Mystic and Steelshaper's Gift. With Puresteel Paladin and Battlefield Improvisation to reduce equip costs and draw cards, the deck aims to create a powerful, evasive threat that can quickly end the game. Nettlecyst and Shadowspear provide additional utility and resilience, while Urza's Saga can help find key artifacts. The deck aims to win quickly through the combo of equipping a creature with Colossus Hammer.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on quick and aggressive creature plays, supported by burn spells and combat tricks. The key strategy is to overwhelm the opponent with early aggression, utilizing cards like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Guide of Souls. The deck also includes some control elements with cards like Static Prison and Ajani, Nacatl Pariah to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The inclusion of powerful finishers like Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury ensures that the deck can close out games quickly before the opponent has a chance to stabilize.

The main theme of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures and aggressive spells, focusing on quick and decisive victories. By utilizing cards like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury, the deck aims to deal damage quickly and efficiently. The inclusion of cards like Goblin Bombardment and Guide of Souls provide additional ways to control the board and maintain pressure on the opponent. Ajani, Nacatl Pariah serves as a powerful finisher, helping to secure victories in the late game. Overall, the deck is built around a fast-paced, aggressive playstyle to dominate the battlefield.

The main idea of this deck is to control the game by using powerful Eldrazi creatures and spells to disrupt your opponent's strategy. By utilizing the Urza lands to quickly ramp up your mana, you can cast big threats like Thought-Knot Seer and Karn, the Great Creator early in the game. The deck also includes powerful removal spells like Dismember and All Is Dust to deal with any threats your opponent may play. Overall, this deck aims to overwhelm your opponent with high-impact plays and powerful control elements.
